item.title: Slipknot Shares New Single 'Birth of the Cruel'
item.description: Slipknot Shares New Single ‚ÄòBirth of the Cruel‚Äô
item.content:encoded:
Slipknot has shared a new single just days away from the release of their highly-anticipated sixth studio album.

The video for ‚ÄúBirth of the Cruel‚Äù also features Corey Taylor and company in their white summer jumpsuit look and a closer look at their new masks.

The track is the third single from We Are Not Your Kind, which will be released on Friday. The band is already on the road for their Knotfest Roadshow with special guests Volbeat, Gojira and Behemoth. Get the full list of dates here.

For more Slipknot spirit, check out the band‚Äôs new whiskey and their new face filters on Facebook. The social network has unveiled a different one for all nine members, as well as a black hood with the Slipknot logo.

Wear The Masks üé™ | #WeAreNotYourKind

Posted by Slipknot on Wednesday, July 31, 2019
item.subHeadline: The video features a closer look at their new masks
item.seoHeadline: Slipknot Shares New Single 'Birth of the Cruel'
item.dc:creator: Bob Diehl

item.title: Sophie Turner Snuggles New Pup After Death of Dog Waldo
item.description: The Game of Thrones start and her Jonas brother husband were seen at their home in Miami over the weekend, cuddling an adorable golden retriever puppy, seemingly the new addition to their family, just about a week after the death of their dog Waldo Picasso.
item.content:encoded:
Sophie Turner has a fresh case of puppy love.

The Game of Thrones star was seen getting some snugs in with a new dog over the weekend at the Miami home she shares with rocker husband Joe Jonas.

#SophieTurner gets puppy snuggles from a new dog after the death of Waldohttps://t.co/s6sax6OYc7 pic.twitter.com/a5pGZkq0Ku

— ET Canada (@ETCanada) August 4, 2019

The mini golden retriever appears to be a new member of the family. Turner was seen cradling the puppy like a baby, sporting a dark green, two-piece bathing suit and wrapped in a towel.

She was also seen holding the dog earlier in the weekend while climbing off the Jonas Brothers jet in an Instagram story video posted by Jonas‚Äô brother and bandmate, Nick Jonas.

Mr and Mrs Jonas pic.twitter.com/uyoL5ywSpb

— J O E J O N A S (@joejonas) July 4, 2019

The shots of the canine cuddling are the latest in the fuzzy wuzzy rollercoaster of emotional ups and downs since the newlyweds tied the knot in a lavish ceremony in France back in June, a picture of which Joe shared with the caption, ‚ÄúMr and Mrs Jonas.‚Äù

Late last month, Turner and Jonas lost their former dog Waldo Picasso in a ‚Äúfreak accident‚Äù when the dog ran into the street while out on a walk in New York.

The couple paid tribute to their late pet shortly after with matching dog tattoos last Tuesday.

View this post on Instagram

R.I.P. my little angel.

A post shared by J O E J O N A S (@joejonas) on Jul 29, 2019 at 2:28pm PDT

‚ÄúR.I.P. my little angel,‚Äù Joe Jonas captioned an Instagram photo of his new ink.

The couple was so distraught by the death of their pup that they waited two full days to report the incident.
item.seoHeadline: Sophie Turner Snuggles New Pup After Death of Dog Waldo
item.dc:creator: Eldis Sula

item.title: SCREENSHOTS: There Is yet Another 'Little Mermaid' in the Works With Queen Latifah and Shaggy
item.description: There is yet another version of ‚ÄòThe Little Mermaid‚Äô coming soon. This one features Queen Latifah and Shaggy.
item.content:encoded:
Just as we were checking our ‚ÄúLizzo Is The One True Ursula‚Äù Change.org petition, we were hit with some startling news. There is yet another version of The Little Mermaid in the works.

ABC has announced plans for The Little Mermaid Live! The television special will feature music from the original film and from the Broadway stage production, airing this November 5.

The live-action musical will feature Auli‚Äôi Cravalho, who voiced the lead character in Moana, taking on the role of Ariel. Queen Latifah will be playing the villainous Ursula, and Mr. Boombastic himself, Shaggy, will be playing party crab Sebastian.

This is the second edition of The Little Mermaid announced in recent weeks, with Disney making casting announcements last month about their theatrical live-action version of the 1989 film. Singer Halle Bailey has been revealed to be playing Ariel in that version of Mermaid, with Awkwafina and Jacob Tremblay also attached.

Rumors about casting for the movie update have caused controversy, with ‚ÄúTruth Hurts‚Äù singer Lizzo publicly expressing interest in playing Ursula, despite word of Melissa McCarthy being offered the role. Harry Styles has also been rumored to be playing the role of Prince Eric. One thing we can all agree upon, Shaggy should also be Sebastian from this point forward.

WATCH MORE: Lizzo Shows off Chops for Playing Ursula in New Disney 'The Little Mermaid‚Äô

The Little Mermaid Live! airs November 5 at 8 PM ET on ABC.
item.subHeadline: A musical version is coming to ABC
item.seoHeadline: Another 'The Little Mermaid' With Queen Latifah and Shaggy
item.dc:creator: Michael Cerio

item.title: ‚ÄòVanderpump Rules‚Äô Star Stassi Schroeder: 'I Got Engaged in a Cemetery'
item.description: See the ring that marks Stassi Schroeder and Beau Clark‚Äôs engagement!
item.content:encoded:
Stassi Schroeder has taken her relationship with Beau Clark to the next level, and she's opening up about some of the unique details surrounding the proposal.

The ‚ÄúVanderpump Rules‚Äù star revealed she got engaged in an Instagram post on Wednesday, and has now opened up on her RADIO.COM podcast, "Straight Up with Stassi," about the one-of-a-kind details.

View this post on Instagram

OMG. I feel like Meghan Markle. üíç

A post shared by Stassi Schroeder (@stassischroeder) on Jul 31, 2019 at 3:34pm PDT

"It was perfect," she says. "I got engaged in a cemetery."

Questions began to swirl around fans' minds. Why a cemetery? What were they doing there?

Schroeder explains that it all goes back to the Schroeder family mausoleum in New Orleans. Following the death of her grandmother, she realized she wanted to be buried in a mausoleum like her family, but not without Clark.

"I don't want to be buried separate from him, so I need to get my own mausoleum," she clarifies to her podcast listeners.

So the day of browsing began, and Schroeder unknowingly walked right into her own engagement. "I thought I was going mausoleum shopping," Schroeder explains. "I basically planned my own proposal because I had been telling him I wanted to go mausoleum shopping."

Meanwhile, last week, Stassi‚Äôs Bravo boss Andy Cohen was quick to congratulate the couple while also pointing out the eccentric location where Beau popped the question.

"Very happy for you both. And thank God he had the sense to propose at a cemetery,‚Äù the ‚ÄúWatch What Happens Live‚Äù host commented on the photo.

Clark also posted the romantic news by sharing a cute photo smooching his bride-to-be, which he captioned, "Sloppy Kisses 4 Life!"

View this post on Instagram

Sloppy Kisses 4 Life! #FromDarkToClark

A post shared by Beau (@thegoodthebadthebogie) on Jul 31, 2019 at 4:04pm PDT

While the newly engaged couple have been dating since February 2018, Stassi revealed in an earlier podcast episode her desire to start a family.

‚ÄúI want to get pregnant, honestly before I even ‚Äî I mean I have like more babies on the brain than I do getting married,‚Äù the 30-year-old said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm really excited to be a mom.‚Äù

Stassi and Beau‚Äôs engagement comes on the heels of her ex-boyfriend and fellow ‚ÄúVanderpump Rules‚Äù co-star Jax Taylor‚Äôs wedding to Brittany Cartwright in June.

While Schroeder wasn't eager to give too much away on her podcast, she assured fans that there would be a lot more details to behold when the episode of "Vanderpump Rules" airs.

To hear more from Stassi Schroeder, download the RADIO.COM podcast, ‚ÄúStraight Up with Stassi.‚Äù
item.seoHeadline: Stassi Schroeder: 'I Got Engaged in a Cemetery'
item.dc:creator: Johnny Lopez
Jacquie Cadorette

item.title: Dierks Bentley Is Happy to Share the Spotlight With His Children
item.description: Dierks Bentley Is Happy to Share the Spotlight With His Children
item.content:encoded:
Dierks Bentley‚Äôs three children are increasingly becoming a part of his career as they get older, and with the extra attention comes a friendly sibling rivalry.

The country star‚Äôs 5-year-old son, Knox, makes an appearance in the video for his most recent single ‚ÄúLiving.‚Äù It‚Äôs a heartwarming clip that features the two spending quality time together and enjoying life. Not to be outdone, Knox‚Äôs 10-year-old sister is already making her own plans for dad‚Äôs next video, as Bentley told Jesse Addy of New York‚Äôs Country 94.7.

‚ÄúI just got done climbing a mountain (last week) out in Wyoming: the Grand Teton ‚Äì 18 hour climb, 7,000 vertical feet, and my daughter, Jordan, she wants to do something like that and tape it and make the video for ‚ÄòThe Mountain,‚Äô Bentley said. ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs convinced it‚Äôs happening so I gotta figure that one out.‚Äù

Knox, Jordan and their sister, Evelyn, have all appeared on-stage with their dad and take part in his concerts. Knox sings and dances during the bluegrass segment, Jordan joins him for country covers and Evelyn sings during the main show.

‚ÄúWhenever they come out it‚Äôs just becoming more and more fun because they‚Äôre involved in the tour,‚Äù Bentley said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not having to take care of them. They‚Äôre just part of the circus.‚Äù

You can catch Bentley and maybe his children on his Burning Man tour this summer. Get the full list of dates here.
item.subHeadline: Knox just appeared in a video; Jordan wants to be next
item.seoHeadline: Dierks Bentley Shares the Spotlight With His Children
item.dc:creator: Bob Diehl

item.title: Artist to Artist: How BTS Gave Halsey the Gift of Patience
item.description: BTS are looking for the perfect gift for Halsey, but maybe it‚Äôs been there the whole time.
item.content:encoded:
Oh my my my, BTS and Halsey are still one of our favorite collaborations of the year. The K-pop superstars and the ‚ÄúWithout Me‚Äù Queen connected in April on ‚ÄúBoy With Luv‚Äù and they‚Äôve been a perfect match ever since.

Before their performance earlier this year at the Billboard Music Awards, Halsey gifted the group with matching bracelets, as a token of their friendship and her appreciation. ‚Äú"It's just so they remember me when they go away‚Äù she told us before the award show. ‚ÄúWhen they go back to Korea and I don't get to hang out with them every day like I do now."

In the exclusive video above, BTS are searching for the perfect gift to return the favor.

‚ÄúWhat do you want to get as a present if we could give you something?‚Äù asks RM, as the others smile beside him.

‚ÄúFirst of all, that‚Äôs cheating‚Äù Halsey chuckles. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre trying to figure out what I want by asking me and putting me on the spot.‚Äù

It‚Äôs not really cheating, it‚Äôs just well played by the MAP OF THE SOUL: PERSONA signers. However, we still pressed Halsey to deliver something, in hopes we could help them make it happen.

WATCH MORE: BTS on Their Favorite Video Games

‚ÄúI can‚Äôt think of any kind of gift that I would really want from them,‚Äù she says as a smile creeps across her face. ‚ÄúI think maybe just them always being so understanding and patient and calm and cool whenever we‚Äôre doing stuff and I‚Äôm learning something for the first time. I think ultimately that‚Äôs the best gift they have given me and can continue to give me.‚Äù

Wait, is that cheating? That‚Äôs a gift she already has. It‚Äôs tough to hold it against either of them when their mutual appreciation is so pure.

‚ÄúYou put someone in front of a stage, who‚Äôs use to being in the middle the whole time and then you put them in a choreography formation with seven boys, and it‚Äôs like, I‚Äôve been messing up a lot‚Äù she adds. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm glad that they‚Äôve been so patient with me and it‚Äôs made it really fun.‚Äù

Patience. The gift that keeps on giving.

Both BTS and Halsey have multiple nominations at the 2019 MTV Video Music Awards, including for their ‚ÄúBoy With Luv‚Äù video. It all happens Monday August 26.
item.subHeadline: The ‚ÄúBoy With Luv‚Äù collaborators can‚Äôt stop being sweet to each other
item.seoHeadline: Artist to Artist: How BTS Gave Halsey the Gift of Patience
item.dc:creator: Michael Cerio

item.title: Machine Gun Kelly Opens Up on 'Hotel Diablo,' Explains Motley Crue Influence
item.description: Machine Gun Kelly Opens Up on ‚ÄòHotel Diablo,‚Äô Explains Motley Crue Influence
item.content:encoded:
Machine Gun Kelly is taking listeners deep inside his thoughts on his fourth studio LP Hotel Diablo. The first clue is the album cover. It‚Äôs an upside down childhood photo of the rapper with the top of his head opened up.

‚ÄúI was drawn to this picture,‚Äù MGK told RADIO.COM. ‚ÄúSubconsciously, I realized that this album was me confronting a lot of my childhood problems, which I had never really acknowledged in the rest of my work.‚Äù

MGK was also looking to harness something more real on Hotel Diablo. He told us that he thought prior albums didn‚Äôt do as good a job as capturing the energy of his live shows.

‚ÄúWe kept trying to figure out what the missing connection was a between us and new potential fans, and we realized if everyone was falling in love after they saw us in concert than we should have the album just sound like the concert,‚Äù he explained.

Hotel Diablo also draws on MGK‚Äôs rock influences ‚Äì from Avenged Sevenfold to M√∂tley Cr√ºe. He played drummer Tommy Lee in the latter band's Netflix biopic The Dirt. MGK says the experience didn‚Äôt necessarily affect the sound of the new album as much as it influenced his attitude and ambition.

‚ÄúSeeing that they just projected what they wanted to be out to the world and that they actually received that was a big inspiration for me,‚Äù MGK explained. ‚ÄúThey were doing stadium shows in the club. They were like we‚Äôre going to be the stadium act; we‚Äôre going to make it to this point ‚Äì even if we‚Äôre right here. People should feel like this shouldn‚Äôt even be inside this small wall, this should be bigger than life, and I think that is where I was this time. I was like I‚Äôm going to make my best album.‚Äù

The album ends with the YUNGBLUD / Travis Barker collab ‚ÄúI Think I‚Äôm OKAY.‚Äù We asked MGK what his supergroup would be called in the rest of our interview in the video above.
item.seoHeadline: Machine Gun Kelly Talks 'Hotel Diablo' and Motley Crue
item.dc:creator: Bob Diehl

item.title: Pedro Martinez Says He Pitched Through Swine Flu in 2009 World Series
item.description: The then-Phillies pitcher says that he had to labor through what turned out to be the final two starts of his career.
item.content:encoded:
The final chapter of the Martinez-Yankees rivalry came during the 2009 World Series, when Martinez was pitching for the defending World Series Champion Philadelphia Phillies. Two of the Phillies four losses in that series came in games that Martinez started at Yankee Stadium. He now says that he had to labor through what turned out to be the final two starts of his career.

Over the weekend, the Phillies celebrated the 10-year anniversary of their 2009 team. Martinez, for the first time, said that his struggles went beyond being a 37-year-old that preferred pitching in warm weather.

‚ÄúIt wasn‚Äôt told, but most of us were sick,‚Äù Martinez told the collective media, including Matt Breen of The Philadelphia Inquirer. ‚ÄúSome of the guys had swine flu and had to be kept away. I caught some of the virus. We would just never say it. When I got home, I realized that I was really sick.‚Äù

2009 was the height of the swine flu, a sickness that didn‚Äôt discriminate. A 2013 study suggests that it killed more than 200,000 people across the world in 2009, which puts into perspective the severity of it. It‚Äôs unclear exactly to what degree Martinez and his Phillies teammates were afflicted with the swine flu, but it obviously would hinder your ability to compete on the sport‚Äôs biggest stage.

With the Phillies up 1-0 in the series following a complete game from Cliff Lee in Game 1 of the World Series, Martinez got the ball in Game 2. Though he limited the Yankees to six hits and three runs over six innings, A.J. Burnett tossed seven innings for the Yankees, allowing just four hits and one run. Hall of Fame closer Mariano Rivera pitched the final two innings of the game.

However, with a chance to force a pivotal Game 7 of the series, Martinez wasn‚Äôt as effective in his start in Game 6 of the series. The three-time Cy Young Award winner lasted just four innings in what turned out to be the final game of the series, allowing three hits, four walks and two runs.

‚ÄúI had a little bit of an asthma attack in the middle of the game and I was having a hard time breathing,‚Äù Martinez said. ‚ÄúI was really sick. In any other situation, I wouldn‚Äôt be out there. But the team needed me. I held on as long as I could and I did that. I was really proud to have my last game with the Phillies at Yankee Stadium.‚Äù

The Phillies signed Martinez in July of 2009, a few weeks before they would acquire the aforementioned Lee. In nine regular season starts, he went 5-1 with a 3.63 ERA, 4.28 FIP and 0.5 fWAR. In Game 2 of the NLCS, seemingly when he didn‚Äôt have the Swine Flu, Martinez tossed seven dominant innings against the Los Angeles Dodgers, allowing just two hits.
item.seoHeadline: Pedro Martinez Pitched Through Swine Flu in '09 World Series
item.dc:creator: Tim Kelly

item.title: Chance the Rapper Addresses 'The Big Day' Criticism: 'People Want Me to Feel Ashamed'
item.description: Chance The Rapper goes on a tweetstorm that starts scary and ends with love, likely in response to criticism of ‚ÄòThe Big Day.‚Äô
item.content:encoded:
Chance The Rapper‚Äôs debut album, The Big Day, came up just short of the number one spot this week, landing behind The Search from Michigan rapper NF. It is NF‚Äôs second time in the top position, and the highest performance yet from Chance.

On Monday morning, Chance seemed to aired out some feelings about the reaction to the album, which centers on themes of his marriage and family.

WATCH MORE: How Death Cab For Cutie Ended Up Collaborating With Chance The Rapper

‚ÄúI‚Äôm getting this crazy feeling that people want me to kill myself‚Äù he wrote shockingly in the first tweet of several. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs not my vibe at all, but i feel the push. And I feel like even more than that, some people want me to feel ashamed.‚Äù

‚ÄúShame is heavy yo. And feeling shame for something that you were once prideful about is super heavy‚Äù he continued. ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs really weird is that music is the number one thing that influences how I feel on the daily.‚Äù

‚ÄúFor anybody out there that‚Äôs texted me the past few days, I appreciate you. And I‚Äôm happy being able to spend time with my family and do a lot of the things I used to do before I got so wrapped up in making this project‚Äù Chance added. ‚ÄúAnd the number one thing that‚Äôs been on my heart and has been reaffirmed in the last week that I‚Äôm now 100% sure of is‚Ä¶ That I LOVE my wife.‚Äù

The string of messages is troubling and confusing at first, but appears to be a reaction to critics of The Big Day and its themes. Conversely, The Search from NF plays as a very different album, dealing more with the struggles of mental health vs. the joy of marriage.

Several minutes later, Chance attempted to clarify his comments.

‚ÄúI just want to reiterate that I don‚Äôt want to kill myself, nor am I ashamed of loving my wife. I think I just wanted to say out loud that I see the vibes‚Äù he wrote. ‚ÄúTryna tell yall how I feel now I done f***around missed chik fil a breakfast.‚Äù

You can read the full string of tweets from Chance The Rapper below.

I‚Äôm getting this crazy feeling that people want me to kill myself üò¢

— The Big Day out now (@chancetherapper) August 5, 2019

That‚Äôs not my vibe at all, but i feel the push.

— The Big Day out now (@chancetherapper) August 5, 2019

And I feel like even more than that, some people want me to feel ashamed.

— The Big Day out now (@chancetherapper) August 5, 2019

Shame is heavy yo. And feeling shame for something that you were once prideful about is super heavy.

— The Big Day out now (@chancetherapper) August 5, 2019

What‚Äôs really weird is that music is the number one thing that influences how I feel on the daily

— The Big Day out now (@chancetherapper) August 5, 2019

Like can really push me to one side or the other. And thats super raw to me. Cause I‚Äôm sure there‚Äôs other people that get their fuel from music

— The Big Day out now (@chancetherapper) August 5, 2019

So for anybody out there thats texted me the past few days, I appreciate you. And I‚Äôm happy being able to spend time with my family and do alot of the things I used to do before I got so wrapped up in making this project

— The Big Day out now (@chancetherapper) August 5, 2019

And I wanna let some of these feelings go cause thats whats twitter is for. For people to say exactly whats on their hearts

— The Big Day out now (@chancetherapper) August 5, 2019

That I LOVE my wife

— The Big Day out now (@chancetherapper) August 5, 2019

I just want to reiterate that I don‚Äôt want to kill myself, nor am I ashamed of loving my wife. I think I just wanted to say out loud that I see the vibes üëÄüëÄ

— The Big Day out now (@chancetherapper) August 5, 2019

Tryna tell yall how I feel now I done fuckaround missed chik fil a breakfast

— The Big Day out now (@chancetherapper) August 5, 2019
item.subHeadline: The rapper shares a tweetstorm about what‚Äôs been on his heart
item.seoHeadline: Chance The Rapper Responds to Critics of 'The Big Day'
item.dc:creator: Michael Cerio

item.title: Britney Spears Gushes Over 'Really Hot' Boyfriend
item.description: Britney Spears Gushes Over ‚ÄòReally Hot‚Äô Boyfriend
item.content:encoded:
Britney Spears is living the dream. The pop star is smitten with her boyfriend, Sam Asghari, and she wants the whole world to know it.

The couple, who recently attended their first movie premiere together, were having a nice morning together in the kitchen when the ‚ÄúSlumber Party‚Äù singer couldn‚Äôt hold back her feelings. She filmed a video for Instagram that explained exactly how she felt.

‚ÄúI can‚Äôt believe I wake up every morning to this man,‚Äù Britney said as she winked and panned over to Sam at the stove. ‚ÄúNot only is my boyfriend really hot, he‚Äôs probably the best chef in the world and he‚Äôs showing off right now.‚Äù

View this post on Instagram

Belly rules the mind !!!!

A post shared by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Aug 3, 2019 at 4:56pm PDT

That wasn‚Äôt the only moment that had Britney feeling fine over the weekend. She also spent a day at Disneyland with her sons, and even got 13-year-old Sean and 12-year-old Jayden to pose for a pic with mom.

‚ÄúGreat time at Disneyland today,‚Äù the 37-year-old wrote. ‚ÄúBut I don‚Äôt remember ever getting that wet on splash mountain!!! Geeez .... anyhow my boys are older now, so they don‚Äôt like their picture taken ever... so I was thrilled today when they said SURE !!!!! Such a great place!!!‚Äù

View this post on Instagram

Great time at Disneyland today .... but I don‚Äôt remember ever getting that wet on splash mountain üèî!!! Geeez .... anyhow my boys are older now, so they don‚Äôt like their picture taken ever... so I was thrilled today when they said SURE !!!!! Such a great place !!!!!

A post shared by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Aug 4, 2019 at 10:40pm PDT

Britney shares both boys with her ex-husband, Kevin Federline.
item.subHeadline: The pop star also posed for a pic with her sons at Disneyland
item.seoHeadline: Britney Spears Gushes Over 'Really Hot' Boyfriend
item.dc:creator: Bob Diehl

item.title: A$AP Rocky Spotted at Sunday Service With Kanye West and Kendall Jenner
item.description: Shortly after being released from jail in Sweden, A$AP Rocky shows up at Sunday Service with Kanye West and Kendall Jenner.
item.content:encoded:
Shortly after leaving jail in Sweden and landing back in the US, A$AP Rocky made his way to Kanye West‚Äôs weekly Sunday Service event.

West was the one which prompted the involvement of President Trump in a call for his release, after the rapper was detained for being a part of a brawl in Stockholm. A$AP Rocky was held through most of July, but was freed on Friday while he awaits the return of a verdict. That decision is set to be delivered on August 14.

Just spoke to @KanyeWest about his friend A$AP Rocky‚Äôs incarceration. I will be calling the very talented Prime Minister of Sweden to see what we can do about helping A$AP Rocky. So many people would like to see this quickly resolved!

— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) July 19, 2019

Sunday Service is a weekly gathering hosted by West and a collection of musicians, worshipping through music and community. After a successful edition at Coachella earlier this year, West has recently gained notice for reworking classics from Nirvana and No Doubt at the event and turning them into songs of praise.

WATCH MORE: Why Kanye West's Sunday Serve Made Gwen Stefani Cry

On Sunday A$AP Rocky was spotted at the eventSunday Service, talking with West and former girlfriend Kendall Jenner.

View this post on Instagram

. . . . . . . #kanyewest #asaprocky #sunday #service #hypebeast #kanyesundayservice #sundayservice #justice #fashionkilla #freedom #complex #complexcon #theshaderoom

A post shared by OfAllPeople üêú. (@oap.studios) on Aug 4, 2019 at 4:42pm PDT

View this post on Instagram

‰Ωï„ÅØ„Å®„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„ÇåÂá∫„Å¶„Åì„Çå„Å¶ËâØ„Åã„Å£„Åü„Åß„Åô„Å≠ü§ó #hiphop #freeasaprocky #asaprocky #Repost @power_106 with @get_repost „Éª„Éª„Éª #ASAPRocky spotted at #SundayService with #ASAPFerg & #KendallJenner üëÄüôèüèΩüëÄ | üìπ: @chucky.blk @complex

A post shared by Nobu Koike (@djpon) on Aug 4, 2019 at 1:29pm PDT

Prosecutors allege that A$AP Rocky and two others beat a 19-year-old man in June. The rapper is claiming that he acted in self-defense, and testified on his own behalf last week. They are recommending 6 months in prison for the crime.

After news of his release, President Trump once again tweeted about the star in a pun-filled message. ‚ÄúA$AP Rocky released from prison and on his way home to the United States from Sweden. It was a Rocky Week, get home ASAP A$AP!‚Äù
item.subHeadline: The rapper was freed from jail in Sweden on Friday
item.seoHeadline: A$AP Rocky at Sunday Service With Kanye and Kendall Jenner
item.dc:creator: Michael Cerio

item.title: 'Avocado to My Toast': Gisele Wishes Hubby Tom Brady Happy Birthday
item.description: The Brazilian supermodel took to Instagram to wish her star quarterback husband a happy birthday on the weekend Brady agreed to a two-year/$70 million contract extensions with the New England Patriots.
item.content:encoded:
Over the weekend, Tom Brady celebrated his 42nd birthday, and his wife, Gisele B√ºndchen, took to Instagram to wish him a happy birthday:

View this post on Instagram

Happy birthday love of my lifeeey! Life is so much better because we can share it with you! Thank you for being our rock, and the avocado to my toast ! We love you! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Feliz anivers√°rio amor da minha vida! A vida √© muito melhor porque podemos compartilha-l√° contigo. Obrigada por ser nosso porto seguro e o abacate da minha torrada. N√≥s te amamos!

A post shared by Gisele B√ºndchen (@gisele) on Aug 3, 2019 at 8:11am PDT

Her post read as follows: ‚ÄúHappy birthday to the love of my lifeeeey! Life is so much better because we can share it with you! Thank you for being our rock, and the avocado to my toast! We love you!‚Äù

It turned out to be quite the weekend for the Brady family. Beyond celebrating the birthday of the 14-time Pro-Bowler, Brady agreed to a two-year/$70 million contract extension with the Patriots that puts him under contract through 2021, which would be his age-44 season.

The much-talked-about extension came at the end of a week in which Brady signed with the William Morris Endeavor talent agency for off-field representation, and the Brady Bunch is reportedly shopping for homes in the NYC suburbs, leading some to speculate that the star quarterback is preparing for life after football.

During last Thursday‚Äôs NFL Hall of Fame Game, NBC‚Äôs Cris Colinsworth reacted to a highlight of an early 2000s playoff game by remarking how incredible it is that Tom Brady is still playing at an elite caliber nearly two decades later. The six-time Super Bowl Champion does seem to have father time at bay, and hopes that trend will continue into 2019, his 20th NFL season.

A sixth-round pick out of Michigan in the 2000 NFL Draft, Brady will enter the 2019 season with 70,514 career passing yards, good for fourth in NFL history. In 2018, he played all 16 regular season games for the 15th time in his illustrious career, tossing 29 touchdowns and throwing for 4,577 yards, the 10th 4,000 plus yard passing season of his career.

Though there‚Äôs often been speculation about what role Gisele may play in deciding Brady‚Äôs future, the three-time NFL MVP has guided the Patriots to eight-straight appearances in the AFC Championship Game. There‚Äôs little indication that Brady won‚Äôt be able to achieve his stated goal of playing into his mid-forties.
item.seoHeadline: Gisele Bundchen Wishes Tom Brady Happy Birthday on Instagram
item.dc:creator: Tim Kelly

item.title: Too Hot: AC/DC Shares Rejected 'Highway to Hell' Album Cover
item.description: Too Hot: AC/DC Shares Rejected ‚ÄòHighway to Hell‚Äô Album Cover
item.content:encoded:
AC/DC continues to celebrate the 40th anniversary of their one of their most beloved and hardest rocking albums. Today we‚Äôre getting a look at the original Highway to Hell album artwork. It was rejected by the band‚Äôs American label for being too, well, hellish.

The group shot of AC/DC was the same as the one that appeared on the official release, but Angus Young‚Äôs devil horns look a little more evil with band members engulfed in flames. The album title sits on a guitar fretboard at the bottom, whereas the final product didn‚Äôt include the guitar. AC/DC says the concept was ‚Äúshot down in flames by the American record company.‚Äù

View this post on Instagram

The original 'Highway To Hell' cover was "shot down in flames" by the American record company... ‚ö°Ô∏è‚ö°Ô∏è‚ö°Ô∏èüî•üî•üî•

A post shared by AC/DC (@acdc) on Aug 3, 2019 at 7:00am PDT

To celebrate four decades of their final album with frontman Bon Scott, the band has also been sharing some live rarities from the same era. Check out ‚ÄúWhole Lotta Rosie‚Äù from Countdown in 1979.
item.subHeadline: The original idea was a lot more "hellish"
item.seoHeadline: AC/DC Shares Rejected 'Highway to Hell' Album Cover
item.dc:creator: Bob Diehl

item.title: 3 NFL Takeaways Ahead of Preseason Week 1
item.description: With the first week of preseason football before us, Zeke Elliott plays holdout hardball, fans can‚Äôt wait to the Cleveland Browns, and the AFC South is full of promise.
item.content:encoded:
However NFL fans may feel about Thursday Night Football during the regular season, complaints about football this Thursday will be few and far between when the NFL preseason officially kicks off with 11 preseason games scheduled to be played.

Before Week 1 of the preseason, here‚Äôs three early thoughts on the 2019 NFL season.

Ezekiel Elliott is right to hold out

Never mind that Ezekiel Elliott can‚Äôt become a free-agent until after the 2020 season. Even after the 2020 season, the chances of Elliott actually hitting the open market are slim at best. The Dallas Cowboys could place the franchise tag on him in 2021 and again in 2022 if they are unable to reach a long-term deal. And teams have around the league have taken advantage of this - the Steelers had Le‚ÄôVeon Bell play on the franchise tag in 2017 and tried to have him to do the same in 2018, before he sat out the entire season.

The current CBA is a disaster for star running backs. It assumes that teams will operate under good faith when handling elite running backs, as opposed to having them play out their entire rookie deal, franchising them a time or two and then letting them walk. Someone like Elliott actually is hurt even more by the current CBA than Bell, because Elliott was a first-round pick, so his rookie contract is five years. When you add on an extra two years of being able to be franchise tagged, Elliott could be entering his age-28 season before he gets a chance to become a free-agent.

With the short lifespan that running backs have in the NFL, Elliott, who has rushed for over 4,000 yards in his first three seasons, isn‚Äôt going to wait for it to be his turn. Nor should he. He‚Äôs at the height of his powers, and he‚Äôs trying to capitalize on that financially right now.

Is there a case to be made that the Cowboys should attempt to call Elliott‚Äôs bluff? Perhaps, because much as it may be unethical to run your running back into the ground on his rookie deal, it‚Äôs a systematic loophole that‚Äôs much bigger than one organization. Both Dak Prescott and Amari Cooper are closer to free-agency, and while Elliott is unquestionably the best player of those three, the nature of his position makes him less of a safe investment long-term than Prescott and Cooper.

The problem is that the Cowboys are the defending NFC East Champions, have a quarterback on the final year of his rookie deal and Jerry Jones, desperate to win another title, is approaching his late-70s. This is as good of a chance as they‚Äôll have to make a postseason run as any year, assuming Elliott is in the fold. Those circumstances are not conducive to the Cowboys calling his bluff, they‚Äôre conducive to him getting a long-term deal when he has the highest value.

The team fans can‚Äôt wait to see? The Cleveland Browns

Jon Gruden and the Oakland (for now) Raiders should make for must-watch television when they are chronicled on this season of HBO‚Äôs Hard Knocks. But showhead Ken Rodgers told Jimmy Traina of Sports Illustrated that the network did ponder the idea of running it back for a second consecutive year with the Cleveland Browns - and just about every potential viewer would have been here for that.

Instead, we‚Äôll have to wait for Thursday night, when the Browns welcome the Washington Redskins to FirstEnergy Stadium, to get our first look at the 2019 Browns. And perhaps for the first time in since the Browns re-entered the league in 1999, excitement around the Browns extends well outside of the state of Ohio.

‚ÄúI just feel like it‚Äôs going to be scary,‚Äù Browns new wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr. told Cleveland.com‚Äôs Mary Kay Kabot about how he feels the team‚Äôs offense will look when he gets on the same page with 2018 No. 1 overall pick Baker Mayfield.

Beckham‚Äôs quote isn‚Äôt just Training Camp talk. He‚Äôs a three-time Pro Bowler that is joining an offense that already included his former college teammate Jarvis Landry, Nick Chubb, David Njoku and the aforementioned Mayfield, who has +1100 odds to win the NFL MVP in his sophomore season. The Browns also took a chance on former Kansas City Chiefs running-back Kareem Hunt, who will be suspended the first eight weeks of the season, but ran for 1,327 yards in 2017, his rookie season.

There‚Äôs an it factor that Mayfield possess that makes him must-watch television. Beckham, as much as he may rub some the wrong way, remains a Hall of Fame talent. Those two on the same offense alone would make any team an intriguing watch. When you factor in the depth of offensive skill position players, you start to see a scenario where by the second-half of the 2019 season, the Browns offense could indeed look ‚Äúscary.‚Äù

Is there a part of you that wonders if things are too good to be true for the Browns, a team that went 0-16 just two years ago? Perhaps, but this just feels different. The Browns have a franchise quarterback for the first time in the lifetimes of most NFL fans and have done a very good job of starting to build around him.

The AFC South may be the most intriguing division in the NFL

The AFC South was the only division in football in 2018 that had three teams post winning records. It‚Äôs hard to imagine that happening two years in a row, but if there‚Äôs any division where it could in 2019, it‚Äôs probably this one.

The Indianapolis Colts won their final four regular season games in 2018 and snuck into the playoffs is Frank Reich‚Äôs first season as head coach. In theory, they should have quite a bit of momentum heading into 2019, but Andrew Luck is dealing with a calf injury and given his injury history, it‚Äôs hard not to at least wonder how that will affect the Colts season.

This will be Bill O‚ÄôBrien‚Äôs sixth season as Houston Texans head coach. While the Texans went 11-5 in 2018 - the third time they‚Äôve made the playoffs under his watch - the jury is largely still out on what he is as a head coach in the NFL. Unlike last year, quarterback Deshaun Watson isn‚Äôt returning from an ACL injury, so there‚Äôs reason to be optimistic he and DeAndre Hopkins can guide the Texans to a second straight AFC South title, assuming the Texans questionable offensive line is able to keep Watson healthy.

Meanwhile, Mike Vrabel, entering his second season as the Titans head coach, left no doubt about his desires to win a Super Bowl title as a head coach this offseason. The Titans have gone 9-7 three straight seasons, and in a contract year for Marcus Mariota need him to stay healthy and take a major step forward to reach the postseason in 2019.

Finally, the Jacksonville Jaguars were perhaps a more aggressive gameplan away from playing in the Super Bowl two seasons ago. The man who won Super Bowl MVP two years ago, quarterback Nick Foles, joined the team this offseason on a four-year/$88 million deal. What he is in his second stint away from Philadelphia, Leonard Fournette‚Äôs ability to stay healthy and the Jaguars ability to post a top-five defense for the third consecutive season will go a long way in determining if Doug Marrone‚Äôs team is able to bounce back from a 5-11 campaign in 2018.

Whether there‚Äôs a team in this division capable of making a run in the AFC playoffs remains to be seen. Certainly, though, you can make a case for every team in the AFC South reaching the postseason in 2019, which makes you think they‚Äôll again send multiple teams to the playoffs in 2019.
item.seoHeadline: 3 NFL Takeaways Ahead of Preseason Week 1
item.dc:creator: Tim Kelly

item.title: ‚ÄòModern Family‚Äô Cast Recreate 10-Year-Old Photo for Epic Throwback
item.description: See the photo that the ‚ÄúModern Family‚Äù cast recreated 10 years later.
item.content:encoded:
It‚Äôs the beginning of the end for ‚ÄúModern Family.‚Äù

The ABC series is entering its 11th and final season, and to celebrate the bittersweet occasion, the cast assembled to recreate a photo taken on the first day of production, according to People.

Back in 2009, the stars took a group shot after the first table read for the first script of the first season of the series.

View this post on Instagram

Ten years ago we took the first cast photo outside our first #modernfamily table read. Today, the ending begins. üò¢

A post shared by Steve Levitan (@stevelevitan) on Jul 31, 2019 at 1:47pm PDT

On Wednesday, Sofia Vergara (Gloria), Ed O‚ÄôNeill (Jay), Rico Rodriguez (Manny), Nolan Gould (Luke), Ty Burrell (Phil), Sarah Hyland (Haley) Julie Bowen (Claire), Ariel Winter (Alex), Jesse Tyler Ferguson (Mitchell), and Eric Stonestreet (Cameron) all assumed the same positions with their respective on-screen families for the epic throwback photo.

The new picture also had one addition as Aubrey Anderson-Emmons, who plays Mitchell and Cameron‚Äôs daughter Lily, didn‚Äôt join the series until the third season.

‚ÄúTen years ago we took the first cast photo outside of our first #modernfamily table read. Today the ending begins,‚Äù the show‚Äôs co-creator Steve Levitan captioned the side-by-side photo on Instagram.

View this post on Instagram

Happy 21st @starringrico !!!!üéâüéâüéâ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

A post shared by Sofia Vergara (@sofiavergara) on Jul 31, 2019 at 1:52pm PDT

While the adults look more or less the same, it‚Äôs the children (now adults too) who really make you realize how much time has passed. This was further illustrated as it also happened to be Rico Rodriguez‚Äôs 21st birthday. Cheers, Manny!

‚ÄúModern Family‚Äù premiered in 2009 and was an instant ratings hit. The show has won 22 Primetime Emmy Awards including five for Best Comedy Series.

The final season is set to premiere on Wednesday, September 25th at 9pm.
item.seoHeadline: ‚ÄòModern Family‚Äô Cast Recreate 10-Year-Old Photo
item.dc:creator: Johnny Lopez

item.title: How Hozier Reinvigorated His Creative Process Following a Multi-Year Tour
item.description: Hozier talks about his process and new album before his set at Lollapalooza.
item.content:encoded:
Hozier has had a whirlwind year with the release of his second studio album Wasteland, Baby! along with his EP Nina Cried Power just a few months earlier.

Its all culminated with a set at Lollapalooza this weekend, taking the stage before The Strokes to close out the night.

Hozier first came to Lollapalooza five years ago off the success of his self-titled debut album and had a multi-year tour of the world that followed. After the extensive process, he took a break to refuel and reinvigorate his creative process. What resulted was his fantastic sophomore album and EP.

"I was kind of processing ideas. I took a few months before I started making demos again," Hozier explained before his performance. "On the road I collected hundreds of little voice memos and little scribbled notes of song ideas."

"Soon after I started working on tunes again" he continues. "That's a good feeling. I missed that. The first love is really hammering together songs, and making something that hadn't existed before. That's super exciting."

For more on the recording of Wasteland, Baby! and how the anxiousness of our times influenced his writing, check out the full interview with Hozier below.
item.subHeadline: Hozier talks touring and his latest album before his big set at Lollapalooza.
item.seoHeadline: How Hozier Reinvigorated His Creative Process
item.dc:creator: Marty Rosenbaum

item.title: 'How to Lose A Guy in 10 Days' Is Getting a TV Reboot
item.description: Read about what the ‚ÄúHow to Lose a Guy in 10 Days‚Äù TV show will look like.
item.content:encoded:
Fans of Kate Hudson and Matthew McConaughey‚Äôs first romcom pairing have something to celebrate.

The new streaming service Quibi has announced they are planning an updated series based on the 2003 romantic comedy ‚ÄúHow to Lose a Guy in 10 Days,‚Äù according to Entertainment Weekly.

How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days adaptation coming to Quibi https://t.co/s6d2AqmnWA

— Entertainment Weekly (@EW) August 1, 2019

Although no casting decisions have been made, it‚Äôs safe to say Hudson and McConaughey will not be returning to play their characters of Andie Anderson and Benjamin Barry.

The original storyline has been tweaked with the revival following ‚Äúa glib young online columnist and an oversexed advertising executive who both need to prove, once and for all, they‚Äôre capable of being monogamous.‚Äù

In the original, Hudson played a magazine writer with an assignment to make a man break up with her in 10 days, while McConaughey was an ad executive who had to prove he could make any woman fall for him. Deception ensued.

The new version is being written by ‚ÄúMindy Project‚Äù alum Guy Burnam, who jokingly revealed how the original will affect the update.

I will be observing and consulting numerous photos of shirtless Matthew McConaughey to properly research this task. pic.twitter.com/UcwcCbfUzY

— Guy Branum (@guybranum) August 1, 2019

‚ÄúI will be observing and consulting numerous photos of shirtless Matthew McConaughey to properly research this task,‚Äù Burnam wrote in a tweet with a clip of a topless McConaughey from the film.

Hudson and McConaughey‚Äôs chemistry proved electric as the film went on to earn $177 million at the box office. The pair would later reunite for the 2008 film ‚ÄúFool‚Äôs Gold.‚Äù

‚ÄúHow to Lose a Guy in 10 Days‚Äù isn‚Äôt the only reboot on Quibi‚Äôs plate as the streaming service previously announced they are developing an update to the 1999 film ‚ÄúVarsity Blues.‚Äù

The streaming service is set to launch in April 2020.
item.seoHeadline: 'How to Lose A Guy in 10 Days' Is Getting a TV Reboot
item.category: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
item.dc:creator: Johnny Lopez

item.title: Kylie Jenner Says Jordyn Woods Wants to Write Khloe Kardashian a Letter After Cheating Scandal
item.description: See what Kylie Jenner said about Khloe Kardashian reconciling with Jordyn Woods that made her roll her eyes.
item.content:encoded:
Tristan Thompson‚Äôs cheating scandal looks to be front and center of the new season of ‚ÄúKeeping Up With the Kardashians.‚Äù

In an explosive new teaser for the upcoming 17th season of the reality series, the NBA star‚Äôs betrayal of Khloe Kardashian continues to rile up the family‚Äôs lives, according to People.

Kylie Jenner gets in the middle of the drama by trying to mediate between her older sister and former best friend Jordyn Woods, who previously admitted to kissing Thompson.

‚ÄúShe wanted to write you a handwritten ‚Ä¶ something,‚Äù Kylie says to Khloe seemingly about Jordyn.

‚ÄúIf she wants to write me a letter‚Ä¶,‚Äù an annoyed Khloe starts to respond, but Kylie interrupts by asking, ‚ÄúShould I give her your address?‚Äù

Khloe‚Äôs death stare makes it clear she‚Äôs no mood to reconcile with her.

If you recall, the ‚ÄúRevenge Body‚Äù star broke up with Thompson earlier this year in part because of his lip-lock with the 21-year-old.

Jordyn recently spoke out about the fallout from kissing Thompson and why she didn‚Äôt tell Khloe and Kylie about it right away.

View this post on Instagram

Our September issue is here and you‚Äôre in for a treat this month üëèüèº swipe for a preview ‚û°Ô∏è and get your copy now!

A post shared by Cosmopolitan UK (@cosmopolitanuk) on Jul 31, 2019 at 11:15pm PDT

"I just need[ed] some time by myself to try to understand what [was] happening, why it [was] happening, and how am I going to react to this internally, you know?‚Äù she told Cosmopolitan UK.

"I could have handled this a million different ways, but I just went with what felt the most natural to me. Would I ever have wanted this to happen? Never. ‚Äú

While it‚Äôs unclear if Jordyn will appear in the new season of "KUWTK," she still hasn‚Äôt made amends with the family as Kylie recently unfriended her on Instagram. Drama!

To get the full story on the entire fiasco fans will have to tune in to ‚ÄúKeeping Up With the Kardashians‚Äù when the new season premieres on September 8that 9pm on E!
item.seoHeadline: Jordyn Woods Wants to Write Khloe Kardashian a Letter
item.dc:creator: Johnny Lopez

item.title: Trump Addresses Mass Shootings, Calls for Gun Control
item.description: Trump addresses mass shootings, condemns hate, racism, calls for gun control‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
(1010 WINS/AP) -- President Trump addressed the nation on Monday morning following two deadly mass shootings over the weekend.

From the White House, Trump condemned the mass shootings saying, "These barbaric slaughters are an assault upon our communities, an attack against our nation and a crime against all of humanity." "We are outraged and sickened by this monstrous evil," he added.

Trump said he wants legislation providing "strong background checks" for gun users, but he provided scant details and has reneged on previous promises after mass shootings.

"We vow to act with urgent resolve," Trump said Monday.

Trump called for a bipartisan solution to make America safer, saying that mental illness and hatred pull the trigger, not the gun. He also proposed the death penalty for those who commit mass murders and hate crimes.

"If we are able to pass great legislation after all of these years, we will ensure that those who were attacked will not have died in vain."

Trump blames a culture in which violent video games and "dark recesses'' of social media contribute to radicalizing perpetrators of mass shootings.

"We must recognize that the internet has provided a dangerous avenue to radicalize disturbed minds and perform demented acts," Trump said.

"We must shine light on the dark recess of the internet and shine a light on mass murders before they start," he adds.

Over the weekend, Trump tried to assure Americans he was dealing with the problem and defended his administration in light of criticism following the latest in a string of mass shootings.

WEB EXTRA: Governor Cuomo Responds To President Trump's Comments on This Weekend's Mass Shootings

"We have done much more than most administrations," he said, without elaboration. "We have done actually a lot. But perhaps more has to be done."

Congress has proven unable to pass substantial gun violence legislation this session, despite the frequency of mass shootings, in large part because of resistance from Republicans, particularly in the GOP-controlled Senate. That political dynamic seems difficult to change.

And Trump himself has reneged on previous pledges to strengthen gun laws.

After other mass shootings, he called for strengthening the federal background check system, and in 2018 he signed legislation to increase federal agency data sharing into the system. But he has resisted Democratic calls to toughen other gun control laws.

In February, the House approved bipartisan legislation to require federal background checks for all gun sales and transfers and approved legislation to allow a review period of up to 10 days for background checks on firearms purchases. The White House threatened a presidential veto if those measures passed Congress.

At a February meeting with survivors and family members of the 2018 Parkland, Florida, school shooting in which 17 people died, Trump promised to be "very strong on background checks."

Trump claimed he would stand up to the gun lobby and finally get results in quelling gun violence. But he later retreated, expressing support for modest changes to the federal background check system and for arming teachers.

Senate Democratic leader Chuck Schumer tweeted that if Trump is serious about strengthening background checks, he should demand Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell "put the bipartisan, House-passed universal background checks bill up for a vote."

In the El Paso attack, investigators are focusing on whether it was a hate crime after the emergence of a racist, anti-immigrant screed that was posted online shortly beforehand. Detectives sought to determine if it was written by the man who was arrested. The border city has figured prominently in the immigration debate and is home to 680,000 people, most of them Latino.

On Twitter Monday, Trump seemed to deflect from scrutiny over the manifesto, which had language mirroring some of his own. As Democrats have called on Trump to tone down his rhetoric, Trump blamed the news media for the nation's woes.

"Fake News has contributed greatly to the anger and rage that has built up over many years," he claimed

As Trump weighs trips to the affected communities ‚Äî the Federal Aviation Administration advised pilots of a presidential visit Wednesday to El Paso and Dayton, Ohio ‚Äî local lawmakers signaled opposition to his presence.

Rep. Veronica Escobar, a Democrat who represents El Paso, said Trump is "not welcome" to visit the city.

In recent weeks, the president has issued racist tweets about four women of color who serve in Congress, and in rallies has spoken of an "invasion" at the southern border. His reelection strategy has placed racial animus at the forefront in an effort that his aides say is designed to activate his base of conservative voters, an approach not seen by an American president in the modern era.

Trump also has been widely criticized for offering a false equivalency when discussing racial violence, notably when he said there were "very fine people, on both sides," after a white supremacist rally in Charlottesville, Virginia, that resulted in the death of an anti-racism demonstrator.

On gun control, a majority of Americans have consistently said they support stronger laws, but proposals have stalled repeatedly in Congress, a marked contrast to some countries that have acted swiftly after a mass shooting.

In March, a poll conducted by The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research found a majority of Americans favor stricter gun laws. The survey was conducted both before and after a mass shooting at two mosques in New Zealand. It found that 67 percent of Americans support making US gun laws stricter, while 22 percent say they should be left as they are and 10 percent think they should be made less strict.

Less than a week after the mosque shootings, New Zealand moved to ban "military-style" semi-automatic weapons and high-capacity magazines; similarly, after a mass shooting in 1996, Australia enacted sweeping gun bans within two weeks.

The poll suggested many Americans would support similar measures, but there's a wide gulf between Democrats and Republicans on banning specific types of guns. Overall, 6 in 10 Americans support a ban on AR-15 rifles and similar semi-automatic weapons. Roughly 8 in 10 Democrats, but just about 4 in 10 Republicans, support that policy.

Like 1010 WINS on Facebook and follow @1010WINS on Twitter to get breaking news, traffic, and weather for New York City.
item.seoHeadline: Trump Addresses Mass Shootings, Calls for Gun Control

item.title: Snickers Will Give Away 1 Million Candy Bars if the Date of Halloween is Changed
item.description: The candy giant has pledged to give away 1 million candy bars if the official date of Halloween is changed to the last Saturday in October.
item.content:encoded:
(WDZH) -- This isn‚Äôt a trick ‚Äî Snickers has pledged to give away 1 million candy bars if the official date of Halloween is changed to the last Saturday in October.

A petition to change the date of Halloween has picked up over 100,000 signatures. This week, it also earned the support of some of the country's most popular candy brands, including Snickers, Skittles and Starbursts.

A Thursday Halloween? Not Satisfying. Halloween on the last Saturday of October? Satisfying. If the Fed Govt makes it official, we‚Äôll offer 1 million free SNICKERS to America. Join the petition! https://t.co/EycXXuc0tB

— SNICKERS¬Æ (@SNICKERS) July 26, 2019

The petition was started by the Halloween & Costume Association (HCA), citing safety concerns about nighttime trick-or-treating activities. The association hopes that the change of date will allow Halloween celebrations to last all day, and therefore reduce Halloween-related injuries.

Additionally, the HCA hopes to extend Halloween activities since ‚Äú51% of millennials say Halloween is their favorite holiday.‚Äù

This year, October 31 falls on a Thursday.

‚ÄúSnickers is all in on celebrating Halloween to the fullest,‚Äù said Josh Olken, Brand Director for Snickers, in a statement. ‚ÄúSo if the Federal Government wants to make this thing official, we‚Äôre offering up to one million free Snickers to America. No tricks, only treats.‚Äù

Other candies (which, like Snickers, are also owned by Mars) started sharing Snickers' tweet, while also encouraging followers to sign the petition.

Petition the rainbow, taste the rainbow. üëá https://t.co/JhX0U8k4a8

— Skittles (@Skittles) July 26, 2019

"Petition the rainbow, taste the rainbow," wrote Skittles, playing off the colorful candy's famous tagline.

Halloween. As it should be. Sign it üëá https://t.co/HBgaEjjqLr

— M&M'S (@mmschocolate) July 26, 2019

The official M&M's account called an annual Saturday Halloween the way "it should be."

The petition needed 100,000 signatures to be brought to the White House for review, and it currently has over 124,000 signatures. Whether the federal government will actually change the date of Halloween is debatable, but Snickers certainly seems willing to bet 1 million free candy bars on it.
item.seoHeadline: Snickers to Give Away 1m Bars if Halloween Date Changed
